hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:“The Prophet (ﷺ) entered upon a sick person to visit him. He said: ‘Do you long for anything? Do you long for Ka’k (a type of bread)?’ He said: ‘Yes.’ So they sent someone to bring some Ka’k for him.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي عِيَادَةِ الْمَرِيضِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning visiting the sick
